DYOR: Do Your Own Octopus Research üêô

Our community run a Telegram Group, we use Snaphot for governance, and we are verified on Etherscan.

Total $OCTO supply is 800k, with 200k allocated to interest program, and 275k to project reserve.

200k sold to early backers ($0.18), and 125k to public via bonding curve distribution (to $1.08).

Read our blog, follow us on twitter, watch our github repos, subscribe to our Telegram Channel, join the community Telegram Group, send us an email, and subscribe below.
